thread.section_title: The Royal Park - A Roseate House Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Indeed royal!
thread.title_full: Indeed royal! - Review of The Royal Park - A Roseate House Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: felina lin l
title: Indeed royal!
text: We booked the Four Poster Suite as it was our honeymoon and it was a great room to relax after 14 days of traveling. Huge bed, luscious fittings & a small balcony where we enjoyed our morning coffee at. We were pleasantly surprised by the hotel as they placed a plate of chocolate-dipped strawberries in celebration of our honeymoon. Such a personal touch, love it! The location was great, a short walk to Paddington station, very convenient if taking Heathrow Express.
